about_page.title: About Us
about_page.subtitle:
WeApnea is the first platform dedicated to freediving events in Italy.
The community is made up of athletes, instructors, coaches, and enthusiasts of both indoor and outdoor freediving. For years, we lived in a fragmented reality — with events scattered across forums, social groups, and word of mouth. There was no single reference point to find stages, workshops, courses, training opportunities, trips, and to give our sport the visibility and inclusiveness it deserves.
So we decided to build that reference point ourselves.

WeApnea was born with a clear goal: to make freediving more accessible, visible, and connected.

What can you find here?
Freediving events organized by certified instructors or schools
Training sessions shared by certified instructors
Collaborations and benefits with brands and partners in the industry
Special projects to help the community grow

We are not a federation. We are not just another social platform.
We are a meeting point — an accelerator for those who want to experience freediving as a journey of growth, both in the water and within themselves.
And this is only the beginning
about_page.mission_desc: Connect freedivers around the world through a platform that makes it easy to join events, trips and training activities. We want to make freediving more accessible and foster a global community of enthusiasts.
about_page.vision_desc: Become the international point of reference for freediving, where every freediver can find opportunities for growth, shared experiences and genuine connections with others in the community.

values.community_desc: We believe in the power of community and sharing experiences to grow together as freedivers.
values.passion_desc: Freediving is our passion and we want to share it through events and unforgettable experiences.
values.innovation_desc: We use technology to make freediving more accessible and to connect freedivers across the world.

about_page.team_desc: We are a team of passionate freedivers, developers and industry professionals working together to create the best possible experience for the freediving community.
